document.masterDocTitle: Survey of the semiaquatic bugs (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Gerromorpha) from Alagoas and Sergipe, Northeast Brazil

subSubSection.paragraph: Geographical distribution: Argentina ( Bachmann 1962 ), Bolivia ( Kuitert 1942 ), Brazil ( Drake & Harris 1933a ), Colombia ( Aristizábal-García 2002 ), Ecuador ( Drake & Harris 1934 ), Guyana ( Kuitert 1942 ), Panama ( Kuitert 1942 ), Paraguay ( Drake & Harris 1934 ), Peru ( Drake & Harris 1935a ), Suriname ( Nieser 1970a ), Trinidad & Tobago ( Alkins-Koo 1990 ), Venezuela ( Nieser 1970a ).
